      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(PlayedCardHolder cardHolder)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the top card of the specified PlayedCardholder from the castle If there is only one card, the PlayedCardHolder will also be removed
        Parameters:
        cardHolder - the PlayedCardholder to remove a card from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card to be removed is not part of the castle
